html:
1.29.18  6:55 am   In 1.27.18  7:17 pm you mention making a list of things to change in your work. Do you get very critical over your own work? I'm having a lot of issues having that critical eye on what I'm doing. When I look at other people's work I have no issue finding the flaws, but when I look at mine? Impossible.  
Everything I've done, I've done for a reason so when I'm trying to look at my work I can't criticize it because of these reasons.  
How do you do?


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201801271917

1.27.18  7:17 pm   What is your process for making a video?

     first figure out how it should go, then figure out how to make it go how i said it should go. then do what i said i should do to make it go how i think it should go. then look at it and freak out because it's not going how i thought it should go. then make a list of adjustments i can make to try to get it to go the way i want it to go. then do what it says on the list. then make another smaller list, and do that list. then make an even smaller list, and do what's on that list. then make an even smaller list and skip that list, and post it online
original_html:
1.29.18  6:55 am   In 1.27.18  7:17 pm you mention making a list of things to change in your work. Do you get very critical over your own work? I'm having a lot of issues having that critical eye on what I'm doing. When I look at other people's work I have no issue finding the flaws, but when I look at mine? Impossible.  
Everything I've done, I've done for a reason so when I'm trying to look at my work I can't criticize it because of these reasons.  
How do you do?

answers_original.html:
1.27.18  7:17 pm   What is your process for making a video?

     first figure out how it should go, then figure out how to make it go how i said it should go. then do what i said i should do to make it go how i think it should go. then look at it and freak out because it's not going how i thought it should go. then make a list of adjustments i can make to try to get it to go the way i want it to go. then do what it says on the list. then make another smaller list, and do that list. then make an even smaller list, and do what's on that list. then make an even smaller list and skip that list, and post it online

html:
1.26.18  1:23 am   6.4.16  12:01 pm expert page lists only 6 things between hoj and hotewig (not counting the 200 some odd reality vids). what happened to the other 5?


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201606041201

6.4.16  12:01 pm   Have you started researching for your new history video before you got sidetracked with the new content? If so, do you think it will be easy for you to get back on track?

     the new content is not a "side track" it is the main track. i have written a series of 11 videos/songs of medium/short length to be released in order. then i picked a topic for a research/history video to go after that (did not start writing it yet), then i started making the videos that are lined up.
original_html: 1.26.18  1:23 am   6.4.16  12:01 pm expert page lists only 6 things between hoj and hotewig (not counting the 200 some odd reality vids). what happened to the other 5?

answers_original.html:
6.4.16  12:01 pm   Have you started researching for your new history video before you got sidetracked with the new content? If so, do you think it will be easy for you to get back on track?

     the new content is not a "side track" it is the main track. i have written a series of 11 videos/songs of medium/short length to be released in order. then i picked a topic for a research/history video to go after that (did not start writing it yet), then i started making the videos that are lined up.

html:
1.22.18  6:19 pm   did you plan history of the world to come out the day before the AP exam for World History or was that a mere coincidence

5.12.17  12:16 am
embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201705120016a

5.12.17  12:16 am   did you know you were posting history of the world right before the ap world history test? (I watched it on the way to test and took it as a sign from the gods)

     people started to tell me about those tests in april, assuming that it would be done by then, and i assumed it would be too. then as it got closer, i almost started to get stressed in a weird way, and then i got sort of upset about being stressed because test-prep is so not the reason i do what i do. if i did that, i would just get on camera and say a bunch of facts, not spend almost a year making the craziest thing i possibly can. so as the video was approaching completion on the week of the test, i was a bit torn because i didn't want to feel like i was racing to finish it for the test. and yet i didn't want to release it the day after the test either. it was very confusing and strange. the test was a very strange thing to think about, and it was very important to remember that that is not the reason i did it
original_html:
1.22.18  6:19 pm   did you plan history of the world to come out the day before the AP exam for World History or was that a mere coincidence

5.12.17  12:16 am

answers_original.html:

     people started to tell me about those tests in april, assuming that it would be done by then, and i assumed it would be too. then as it got closer, i almost started to get stressed in a weird way, and then i got sort of upset about being stressed because test-prep is so not the reason i do what i do. if i did that, i would just get on camera and say a bunch of facts, not spend almost a year making the craziest thing i possibly can. so as the video was approaching completion on the week of the test, i was a bit torn because i didn't want to feel like i was racing to finish it for the test. and yet i didn't want to release it the day after the test either. it was very confusing and strange. the test was a very strange thing to think about, and it was very important to remember that that is not the reason i did it

html:
1.22.18  2:14 pm   Sometimes I'm worried that music has finished its lengthy evolution, and thus everything I compose has already been made by someone else. Do you recognize this feeling?

3.18.16  2:50 pm
embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201603181450

3.18.16  2:50 pm   i feel like there are no ideas left for me, and everyone else has the good ones. i know it's irrational but I'm demotivated. how do I stop being blinkered like this?

     here's a few famous quotes to keep you going:
     'damn, it feels like there's no ideas left' - kurt cobain, 1988
     'damn, it feels like there's no ideas left' - john lennon, 1966
     'damn, it feels like there's no ideas left' - nikola tesla, 1882
     'damn, it feels like there's no ideas left' - beethoven, 1790
     'damn, it feels like there's no ideas left' - shakespeare, 1587
     'damn, it feels like there's no ideas left' - pythagoras, 549 b.c.

     that sounds great, but you would need to also be proficient with shakers and tambourines, etc.. Also, as far as can-like items, we should probably stick to the higher pitch items, because we will be using a standard drum kit, and there won't really be that much room in the soundscape for any other low pitch percussion
